price: Not a single word he utters but there is with him a vigilant watcher, ready [to record it].
arabic: مَّا يَلۡفِظُ مِن قَوۡلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيۡهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٞ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
